verses.roman:
ei ta' karibe vaiṣṇava-dharmera pracāra
ihā haite habe dui kulera nistāra

synonyms: ei ta'-this child; karibe—will do; vaiṣṇava—of Vaiṣṇavism, or devotional service; dharmera—of the religion; pracāra—preaching; ihā haite—from this; habe—there will be; dui—two; kulera—dynasties; nistāra—deliverance.
translation: "This child will preach the Vaiṣṇava cult and deliver both His maternal and paternal families.

purport.content: Only Nārāyaṇa Himself or His bona fide representative can preach the cult of Vaiṣṇavism, or devotional service. When a Vaiṣṇava is born, he delivers both his maternal and paternal families simultaneously.
